Hello,

Sorry for the delay in response. I was waiting word from the server support admins.

We are all set with the suggestions provided. Appreciate your patience in working with us. You can close this ticket.

Justin

From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 7, 2024 4:23 PM
To: Packard, Justin <justin.packard@albaec.com>
Subject: RE: 00424231 - Options for EPP Server backups

CAUTION: This email originated from outside Albany International Corp. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

Hello Justin,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00424231. We haven't heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you're still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We're here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00424231
Ticket Subject: Options for EPP Server backups
Ticket Details: My support rep said to submit a support case for this question.

My Enterprise Infrastructure team is trying to determine what is our best options for configuration backup's of our EPP servers in the event we have a DR scenario or need to recreate our appliance. Could someone help let us know what our options for this would be? Thank you.

Thank you!

Zachary Roy
Technical Account Manager
